author: rovere
body:
This new version will bring in:
- URL shortener from Google
- New index backup (Broen)
- fixes to the sound alarm daemon (Broen, mainly for online)
- fixes to visDQMUpload scripts (Broen)
- rewrite of data cleaner (Broen, for online)

In order to use it, other PR will have to be picked up from the deployment repo: more info the gitlab official ticket.
title: Update DQMGUI to version 8.1.0
